item.title: Unpacking (2021)
item.description: This is an amazing game with lots of heart. And very relaxing. As the title suggest you’re unpacking moving boxes and placing the unpacked items in absolutely beautiful pixel-art rooms. Coming fresh off of Return to Monkey Island I clicked through the first few stages very quickly. But even so I started placing items more deliberately and grouping matching objects (e.g. books) together. I also quickly noticed recurring items, which the unnamed (and unseen) person keeps between places.
